content: Is it ok to share the discord link with potential volunteers, or would you prefer they attend a training or welcome event of some sort? I have some friends that are interested but wanted to confirm before sharing ðŸ™‚
I actually came here to ask the same thing. I noticed we're sending the Discord invite link via text to total strangers. is that wise?

> You're also invited to join our Virtual Field Office, where you can stay in the loop around all things Democratic campaigns and connect with other amazing supporters nationwide: https://discord.com/invite/teamharris

You are allowed to share it, but please be very careful. We believe due to someone sharing it in another space (perhaps another discord server) it attracted trolls and we've been inundated today with them. We'd appreciate if you're very judicious about sending it to huge servers or spaces where you're not sure of intent and political interest of the users. Happy to elaborate more if needed. Thank you.

<@957714233217409174>  got it! but I assume it's fine being in that scripted reply? the person I texted asked if she could share. I will say yes to the txt.democrats .org link, but no on the Discord link, that it's just for her ðŸ˜„
Yes, with text banking we ask first before sending that link so they are somewhat vetted by then, several times.
Thanks for asking. WE love to help clarify!
You could let her know she can share it with only genuine Harris supporters who'd like to volunteer.
Trust your instincts, as we talked about earlier. ðŸ™‚
Awesome, thank you. These are very close friends that are genuinely interested in volunteering so I am confident in sharing it with your blessing. Thanks!!
We trust you. Just spread the word so we don't end up in the news for some troll raid/brigade or something. ðŸ˜‰
We're protecting this server as much as we can but with the amazing growth, comes more potential for that.
Totally understand! Thank you for all you're doing , too!
